mathCurriculum.title: Basic Mathematics
mathCurriculum.description: Fundamental mathematical concepts and operations that form the foundation for more advanced topics.

lessons.title: Natural Numbers
lessons.explanation: Introduction to counting numbers, including their properties and basic arithmetic operations.

lessons.title: Integers
lessons.explanation: Understanding positive and negative whole numbers, including zero, and how to perform operations with them.

lessons.title: Fractions
lessons.explanation: Learning about parts of a whole, equivalent fractions, and operations involving fractions.

lessons.title: Decimals
lessons.explanation: Understanding decimal numbers, their place values, and operations involving decimals.

lessons.title: Percentages
lessons.explanation: Converting between fractions, decimals, and percentages, and solving percentage problems.

lessons.title: Addition and Subtraction
lessons.explanation: Mastering the basics of adding and subtracting numbers, including word problems.

lessons.title: Multiplication and Division
lessons.explanation: Understanding multiplication as repeated addition and division as fair sharing or grouping.

lessons.title: Order of Operations
lessons.explanation: Learning the correct order to perform mathematical operations using the BODMAS/BIDMAS rules.

mathCurriculum.title: Algebra
mathCurriculum.description: Study of mathematical symbols and the rules for manipulating these symbols, which is a fundamental part of higher mathematics.

lessons.title: Variables and Constants
lessons.explanation: Introduction to letters representing unknown quantities and constants in algebraic expressions.

lessons.title: Simplifying Expressions
lessons.explanation: Combining like terms and performing basic algebraic operations to simplify expressions.

lessons.title: Polynomials
lessons.explanation: Understanding polynomials, their degrees, and operations involving polynomials.

lessons.title: Linear Equations
lessons.explanation: Solving equations with one unknown variable and understanding their graphical representations.

lessons.title: Quadratic Equations
lessons.explanation: Solving quadratic equations using various methods, including factoring, completing the square, and the quadratic formula.

lessons.title: Linear Inequalities
lessons.explanation: Understanding and solving inequalities and representing their solutions graphically.

mathCurriculum.title: Geometry
mathCurriculum.description: Study of shapes, sizes, and positions of figures, as well as the properties of space.

lessons.title: Points and Lines
lessons.explanation: Understanding fundamental geometric elements like points, lines, and line segments.

lessons.title: Angles
lessons.explanation: Types of angles, their properties, and how to measure them.

lessons.title: Basic Shapes
lessons.explanation: Identifying and understanding the properties of basic shapes such as circles, squares, and triangles.

lessons.title: Triangles
lessons.explanation: Properties and types of triangles, including isosceles, equilateral, and scalene triangles.

lessons.title: Quadrilaterals
lessons.explanation: Understanding four-sided shapes such as squares, rectangles, and parallelograms.

lessons.title: Other Polygons
lessons.explanation: Properties of other polygons like pentagons, hexagons, and how to calculate their areas and perimeters.

mathCurriculum.title: Trigonometry
mathCurriculum.description: Study of relationships between side lengths and angles of triangles, with applications in various fields.

lessons.title: Sine and Cosine
lessons.explanation: Understanding the basic trigonometric functions and their applications.

lessons.title: Tangent and Cotangent
lessons.explanation: Exploring the tangent function, its reciprocal cotangent, and their properties.

lessons.title: Unit Circle
lessons.explanation: Learning about the unit circle and how it relates to trigonometric functions.

lessons.title: Pythagorean Identity
lessons.explanation: The fundamental trigonometric identity derived from the Pythagorean theorem.

lessons.title: Sum and Difference Formulas
lessons.explanation: Formulas for the sine and cosine of sums and differences, and their applications.

lessons.title: Double and Half-Angle Formulas
lessons.explanation: Exploring the formulas for double and half-angles and their uses.

mathCurriculum.title: Calculus
mathCurriculum.description: Study of continuous change, covering concepts of limits, derivatives, integrals, and their applications.

lessons.title: Introduction to Limits
lessons.explanation: Understanding the concept of limits and their importance in calculus.

lessons.title: Continuity of Functions
lessons.explanation: Exploring continuous and discontinuous functions and how to determine continuity.

lessons.title: Definition of the Derivative
lessons.explanation: Understanding the rate of change of a function and its graphical interpretation.

lessons.title: Rules of Differentiation
lessons.explanation: Learning techniques for finding derivatives, including the product, quotient, and chain rules.

lessons.title: Applications of Derivatives
lessons.explanation: Exploring practical applications of derivatives in various fields.

lessons.title: Indefinite Integrals
lessons.explanation: Introduction to antiderivatives and their properties.

lessons.title: Definite Integrals
lessons.explanation: Calculating areas under curves and understanding the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus.

lessons.title: Applications of Integrals
lessons.explanation: Exploring the applications of integrals in various fields, including physics and engineering.
